basic_info.description: Hello, I'm Tyler Main, and I'm a full-stack JavaScript developer. I'm also a Marine Corps veteran and a first-generation college graduate. I've always loved leveraging technology for creativity and solving problems. I thrive in fast-paced environments where adapting to an ever-changing digital world is a priority and I love being part of a team just as much as taking the lead. My background is a valuable asset to any team that values good taste in visual design elements and strong oral presentation, writing, and copy-editing skills. I encourage you to check out my portfolio to see what I've been up to. Let's build something great together!

projects.title: FitDog
projects.description: The final project for my Code Fellows 201 class. FitDog is an application that uses equations from studies Ohio State University to determine the exact amount of dogfood your dog should have

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for my outdoor sports photography page. Prior to software development I was a photojournalist in the Marine Corps and still take photos on the side
